website_summaries.verdict: Professional-quality carpet cleaner that you can buy for home use.
pros: Cleans on forward and backward passes
Works on all types of carpet
cons: A bit bulky, but it includes a lot of cleaning power

customer_reviews.title: Better buy a couple extra flow indicators
customer_reviews.text: Great machine until your flow indicator springs a leak, and I guarantee it will. If you still want to buy this thing be sure to also buy a couple spare flow indicators also on Amazon. They are made of plastic and will spring a leak and start spraying water all over. A total shame that Bissell does not fix this as it is a very common problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Busse

customer_reviews.title: Headache
customer_reviews.text: It was used 4 times in 1 1/2 years and then stopped working. Took it to the local repair shop and he said he couldn't fix it because of all the headaches Bissell (company) makes it on repair operators for warranty work. He doesn't even sell Bissell because it's a full time job just fixing this brand. By the way this was the second one, the first one didn't work out of the box and had to send it back. $400.00 is a lot of money for something that lasts for a short period of time
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: Power button broke during first use
customer_reviews.text: Power button broke on first use. Wouldn't turn on. Only cleaned one small room. I will update the review if the replacement unit is any better. Besides the power button it worked great. Can't give it a good review if it doesn't last one clean though.
customer_reviews.author: Jake1987

customer_reviews.title: This carpet cleaner is terrible. It was replaced three times and still didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This carpet cleaner is terrible. It was replaced three times and still didn't work. Amazon would not allow me to return, so I contacted Bissell. They are replacing it with the same model. I'm not expecting this one will work either.
customer_reviews.author: janis tucker

customer_reviews.title: only 50% extraction very bulky no steam much like rug doctor
customer_reviews.text: well I was excited about all the positive feedback but the box quoted it works better than the leading rental machine / rug doctor which is garbage not much to claim but on a laymans test full tank of solution and only half a tank extracted each time no mystery I have lots of dirty water in my carpet although I will probably buy a Bissell that has steam clean like what they sell in the stores they actually work well was hoping to find a higher end machine before replacing carpet
customer_reviews.author: jay b.

customer_reviews.title: Read this before buying
customer_reviews.text: I live in an old apartment in downtown Portland Oregon. We have lived here for 3 years and have been very negligent about our carpet. We've never even had a vacuum this whole time. With the foot traffic from the streets into our apartment it got far out of control. We're talking dirt, mud, blood, pee, puke.... Everything under the sun.... We got a vacuum and the Bissell green machine and within 1 hour.... Unbelievable. I HIGHLY recommend this. It's absolutely insane how well it performs.
customer_reviews.author: Josh pierce

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cleaning machine. A heavier machine than I'm used to, but it does extract better than any machine I've owned in the past. This is definitely a professional grade carpet cleaner. I like that the water tanks are larger than I've had in the past and can easily do a normal sized room with just one fill up. Carpets look the best I've seen them in awhile. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dee, from Defiance

customer_reviews.title: Listen to the bad reviews!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used the machine over the weekend and I am already boxing it up again to send it back. This machine does NOT work. It cleans one area but it will leak onto another area so you never get everything really clean. It works sloppy and I can not recommend it. There has to be something better out there.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Hinschberger

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first two times.. now it wont spray and supposedly theres no one withing 4 states that can fix it and I cant return it!! Theres no warranty if you buy from amazon!! NEVER WILL BUY BISSELL AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTY

customer_reviews.title: I cleaned it twice using Bissels best cleaning fluid
customer_reviews.text: I am just sick that I paid this kind of money. We live on a very limited income. It does not clean my carpet. It lightens the soil but it is still there. I cleaned it twice using Bissels best cleaning fluid. The dog urinated on it and I can still smell it. I don't understand why the good reviews. I waited a long time before purchasing this and reviewed many machine and decided this had to be the best so because of the good reviews l threw away the box it came in knowing it was the perfect machine. Also it is very heavy for me to push. My carpet was lightly soiled so that was not the problem.
customer_reviews.author: meme57

customer_reviews.title: Not the right color!
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not write positive reviews but I will make an exception - in this case - and write a negative, actually a very negative, review. This product actually advertises a fake message, they say it will solve bad odours coming from your rug, including cat pee. Well, it doesn't! Especially because my cat keep on peeing on the carpet so the problem is not solved. Moreover the color is not great, that green touch is definitely not my favourite green tone and anyway I would prefer it in Malachite green or Xanadu green. Maybe with a Caput Mortum Brown touch somewhere. For the rest it works flawless and I think I will send it back
customer_reviews.author: valerio

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t see improvement, and many fibers tore from rug.
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited for this machine, and used it the first day I got it. I have 10 month old carpets so they still look very nice overall. The stairs are carpeted though so the landing and stairs had some dirt buildup as well as one random wine stain in a bedroom. Unfortunately the landing doesn’t look any better and the wine stain didn’t come out (I wasn’t expecting the wine stain to go away but I was feeling optimistic). Furthermore, every time I pull the machine back towards me there is a large clump of fiber left on the ground. This isn’t an occasional clump, but a clump every single pass. Is this normal?
customer_reviews.author: M. O.

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job cleaning when it's not leaking everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product about three years ago and have used it maybe ten times. The last couple times I've used it, it started to leak water. Now, it is just dumping water everywhere, soaking the carpet and leaving behind dirt stains...which is obviously an issue because that can lead to mold. So it's basically garbage, at this point. For a $400 product, I really expected more.
customer_reviews.author: jaclyn2311

customer_reviews.title: It clean deep and completely it is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a good cleaner for carpet and this one is amazing. LOL i swear it was getting the dirt from 10 years ago. No but really we had a few stains that i have tried and tried to get up went over the stains 1 time and they are gone my carpets look new and smells great. This carpet machine is better than any I have had or rented well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Morris

customer_reviews.title: Above residential and just below commercial carpet extractor.
customer_reviews.text: I have ran several commercial extractors including truck mounts, walk behind, pull behinds, and ride ons. While the Big Green will not replace a truck mounted cleaning it will beat anything else residential and match your typical pull behind unit and is worth the $400. The 5 warranty is worth it alone and surprised my wife on how dirty the carpet was and why I did my homework and use my professional experience to purchase the unit. Just keep in mind to use hot water, measure your detergent, and rinse with regular water and your carpet will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Holy Cow
customer_reviews.text: How did I not have one of these sooner? Compare to the smaller Bissells, SO easy to fill, dump, set up and clean! Holds 1.75 Gallons so tank goes a long way before it is empty. If it were not for the filthy water that I was dumping, and the beautiful clean carpet, I would swear the carpet had not gotten wet. It is damp at most because it really sucks up the water. Awesome!! Cons: Doesn't corner worth a damn, doesn't get into the corners or edges. You have to do the edges with the attachment separately. I think this is likely the case with all cleaners. Not an issue considering how fabulous a job it does!
customer_reviews.author: T011AZ3

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I am a small person and the machine is very heavy. I took it up stairs in sections as that helped but its still heavy. It did not seem to clean as well as i had hoped, either. I have a carpet washer that cost $99.00 and the only difference i can tell between th two machines is the suction on Green Machine is better. I believe the carpet washer cleans better and it is much smaller and easier to use for some one my size. Green machine seems to be over priced in comparison to what i have already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing really cleans well
customer_reviews.text: This machine really works. It got deep stains out of my carpet, that my two previous cleaners couldn't get out. It gets 4 stars, rather than 5, because it leaves a filthy mess behind in the last spot you have it. This can be avoided by doing the entire room, and planning your exit, like it says in the manual. If you have a large spot to clean, like a 3'x3' area, you either have to clean the entire room 's carpet, or spend 30 minutes manually cleaning the nasty filth it deposits in the last place you have it.
customer_reviews.author: MATTHEW T MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Baby Barf Cleaner @ 3AM
customer_reviews.text: Story retold from my brother-in-law: Baby was sick with the flu. He carried her all night to comfort her. Baby barfed over his shoulder onto the carpet. Took care of cleaning the baby first. Bissel Big Green machine to the rescue. Hauled the machine up from the basement. Filled the tank with clean water and Bissel cleaning solution. Sucked up and cleaned up the mess in no time, leaving the carpet fresh and clean again. Machine dump tanks were easy to clean too...all of this at 3 AM. The Bissel Big Green Professional Carpet Cleaner Machine, 86T3...is a high quality, sturdy, and well-built machine that performs exceptionally well.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This item was to replace a previous Big Green Clean Machine carpet cleaner. I have had great luck with my past one but after LOTS of use it needed replacing. This one has not had any changes. Works, great, cleans carpets thoroughly, easy to use. Comes with attachment for stairs/vehicles as well as three sample bottles of detergent. This particular unit does make a noise from the wheels which my other machine did not do. Not sure what is up with that.
customer_reviews.author: SRC

customer_reviews.title: Needs better scrubber for different types of carpet.
customer_reviews.text: I did alot of research before I purchased this. It was suppose to be the best carpet cleaner. It does work great on Some types of carpet and not so good on others. I live in a rental house so there are 4 different types of carpet in here. I wish there was a better scrubber on this for All types of carpet. I would much rather take all the carpet out and put in hard wood floors but since it's a rental, I couldn't. I have bought one other carpet cleaner, paid 180.00 from Wal-Mart 10 years ago and it finally quit on me and I couldn't find another one like it so that's why I got this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One year later...........
customer_reviews.text: I saw this come up on this year's Black Friday deals and wondered how long we've had ours. One year this month! Just last weekend, I cleaned three rooms and two hallways with great results. I've used this 4 times since we've purchased and it has performed perfectly each time. The only thing downside is the weight. It's a heavy machine but worth the effort for the level of cleaning. After owning a few other cleaners, I've settled on this one as the best. We spent more on this machine than we did on the others but if they don't work, they are a waste of money anyway. This time around, money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Quiteno John

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: Waited to write review until after using it a few times. I have dogs, and with dogs comes dirt, etc. The carpet cleaner does a good job. It does leave water behind, but not as much as some. The brushes do a good job, pulls tons of dirt from carpets. Only complaint is the same as others - it is a beast. Bulky and not a light product, will build your upper arms and shoulders for sure. Does come with a hose, but I don't think I would ever try on stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: The one I got did not clean
customer_reviews.text: Returned it! Do not understand the rave reviews. Maybe I just got a defective one. It was like the brush was not even touching the carpet. So disappointed. I wanted this to work so badly. Carpet did not look any cleaner and I cleaned the same room 4 times.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Wirtjes

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: First impression: We are cleaning carpets one room at a time and started with one of the "cleanest". The fact that the water was nearly black attests to 1) how dirty your carpets are without really knowing it and 2) how deep of a clean this machine provides. I have noticed some overspray when pulling backwards which can lead a trail of water. Adjusting the pull motion to let off the trigger just a few seconds before you get to the end of your pull seems to remedy the problem though.
customer_reviews.author: A. B.

customer_reviews.title: Going strong since 2015
customer_reviews.text: We purchased it in November 2015. It's working well as of November 2018. It uses significantly less water than Rug Doctor (Rental machines available at Home Depot). After using Rug Doctor, our carpets felt wet/moist for about 2 days. With this cleaner, our carpets are dry in 2 to 3 hours. That means less chemicals for our pets and kids to lick on. It cleans better than Rug Doctor also. No equipment failure or breakage with normal use as of November 2018. Easy to clean after a use. Noise level is comparable to other cleaner. Carpet cleaning is a 2 person job to do it comfortably. However, a one person can do it to.
customer_reviews.author: Knight

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Carpet Cleaner! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: So very glad we made this purchase! This is the same carpet cleaner you can rent at our local Lowes and it is definitely commercial grade. Cleans as well as the Rug Doctor brand. Gave new life to our carpets. Areas of carpet that had always been under furniture and appeared rather clean - this machine brought up dust and dirt from down deep! Very powerful brush did a great job of scrubbing and the suction was so powerful, the carpet dried within an hour or two. The hand wand attachment is equally powerful and did a great job of cleaning furniture and the carpet in my car. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable. Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy one of these POSs if I had it to do over. It does an AWESOME job of cleaning your carpet.......when it works. Got this Feb 16th, my wife used it half a dozen times at least then all of a sudden it doesn't turn on. Not to mention when I bought it, it was $80 more. I am not happy. Bought the Asurian warranty which is useless I found out. Instead of swapping a dead machine, I get to take it to a service center and have some 'tech' fix it or declare it dead. And this will take God knows how long, meanwhile we don't have a machine we paid for to use as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Compact, easy to carry, super suction
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. I read the directions to make sure I used it correctly, pulled the cardboard and cleaning solutions out of the cleaning buckets, filled the bottom with water and solution and off I went! Dog marking my husband’s white fabric chair? Clean! Cream carpet with coffee and makeup stains? Clean! Shoe marks on the stairs? Clean! Also, the hose is really easy to attach. And since the upright handle folds down, the machine was pretty easy to carry upstairs. Update: after 3 months of use, we still love it. No complaints. Adding before/after pics of a carpet that I cleaned this morning, and the dirt that the machine sucked up.
customer_reviews.author: Filly

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: With four cats, one old dog, and one puppy in training, buying a carpet shampooer was a no-brainer for our house. This Bissell works great, even after three years, and is very user-friendly. My wife and I actually enjoy watching as we empty the nearly black water down the toilet. Yuck! The stair/upholstery tool takes some getting used to however; it puts out a lot of solution when you pull the trigger, making it hard to control, especially on vertical surfaces, without drenching the fabric. For the price, you can't go wrong with this machine, and it sure beats renting one every time you have a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Abell

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is better than the industrial ones you rent from Home Depot! It’s amazing and gets your carpets squeaky clean! We use a fan to dry the carpets faster but it does a great job suctioning up all the solution out of the carpet! It’s amazing! We have 3 kids and a dog. We usually do our carpets twice a year but since Covid-19 quarantine we couldn’t rent anything. This is a wonderful purchase and I feel like it’ll run for many years to come! It’s a beast!
customer_reviews.author: Twins plus 1

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS LOTS OF WATER AFTER AFEW USES
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner worked well for the first couple of cleanings; however, it is now spewing water out the bottom of it. I cannot determine where, but it only happens when the power is engaged. The cleaner is essentially unusable because it makes a mess of the carpet and leaves a puddle of water at the spot where it is turned off. It also streaks the carpet. I do not use the cleaner very often at all. One would expect a much better product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Great deep clean job I was very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine it got out the satins that we’re here when we moved into our home we rent. It revived the carpet it was easy to use. Definitely glad I purchased it. The attachment tool was easy to put on and use. It cleaned my couches great. The stairs it did a decent job even with that smaller brush. Also didn’t break my back like when I have used rug doctor. Came with attachment and 3 small shampoo cleaners I’d recommend buying more with machine but love it
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: I received this the other day, I used it that evening. I have a very light cream colored carpet. It took out my heavy traffic area with ease. I had two little pet stains from my 5 pound dog.. took that out first run over. My carpets dried very fast, I would say before 3 hours. Dried much faster than when I had the professionals come in. Very happy with my purchase. Now I can do my carpets every couple of months. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: CCNRCC

customer_reviews.title: poor long term factory parts support
customer_reviews.text: The suction nozzle assembly, located on the front of the clean tank, is no longer available. I've taken the whole machine apart, replaced all the gaskets, the fan works good. The loss of suction is due to a leak in that assembly. I can't take it apart. A recent call to the factory didn't even list the part in their system. From what I learned from others, Bissell is known for product obsolescence every 2 years. I would not but a commercial grade unit again. They don't last any longer than the residential grade unit. Mine is only 3 years old and now it's just a parts pile.
customer_reviews.author: J.K.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: If you are on the edge between purchasing this machine or a cheaper carpet cleaner, the Big Green is worth every penny. I had 2 cheaper carpet cleaners prior to buying the Big Green and the did not last very long, so we made the choice to buy a higher end unit. Pros: -High Suction power so the carpets dry very quickly -The tank is large so you can do a large space with minimal hassle. -The tank for the dirty water is so easy to clean so the machine looks new after every use. -Made with high quality materials Cons -Heavy
customer_reviews.author: ejmille2

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT HESITATE TO BUY
customer_reviews.text: My wife originally reviewed this item and this is my review. If you are like me then you have rented "cleaning machines" at you local home improvement stores and have been impressed with the RED machine...let me tell you, this is MUCH better. This cleans in both directions and dries a LOT faster, less waste and has more power. Yes, this is more expensive initially but don't let that stop you...we have bought 4 so called carpet cleaners that have all died within 1-2 years and this has a 5-year warranty. THIS MACHINE is TOP NOTCH...spend the few extra dollars and get something that works better, is better and will pay off for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance using this on expensive hand-loomed carpets - glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Have an older Dirt Devil cleaner that was difficult to use and frankly didn't work very well that was relegated to outdoor carpet only. This applies a nice even spray, firmly brushes the carpet and removes the dirt and water effectively. Much better made than the old one. Using it on some very expensive hand-loomed silk and wool - was frankly worried that it might be too aggressive - really brought the carpet to life.
customer_reviews.author: G. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am a big Bissell fan, especially after spending money on Hoover and several brands. My gripe so far is the way it was shipped, the protective cover that was to go over the machine was instead covering the egg carton it sat in for shipping, the storage bag that was supposed to come with it was gone. There was another empty egg carton smaller package that may have had a brush or attachment, gone. Makes me feel like this is a $400 resend leaving me to feel cheated.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A MUST!
customer_reviews.text: We hate carpet but we rent so...This machine was a big change in our lives! I was so tired to clean the carpet with the conventional cleaner carpet machine!. Last week we rented a machine at Home Depot and it worked at 80%. I am saying that because I noticed that there are non uniform dirt after the cleaning operation. Because the Amazon Day, and the superior experience of the rental machine, we bought this deal and it arrived today with AWESOME results. The results are better than the "professional" machine at Home Depot. It pushed hair from a previous pet!!!! I though that the hairs were gone (after thousand time of vacuum).
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Fausti Neto

customer_reviews.title: Not at all good
customer_reviews.text: Used the machine for the first time yesterday. Used Bissell cleaner provided with machine. I am thoroughly unimpressed. If I could ship it back, I would cover the ship cost. This so-called professional machine did not clean my carpet. My old Hoover does a much better job. I will put this thing in storage and break out the old Hoover for the next time I carpet clean. Really, the Hoover $85. machine does a much better job.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was great...
customer_reviews.text: I liked this machine @ first. I bought it in May and I've used it once. I tried to use it again for some spot cleaning before a party and the handle held attachment didn't work. I barely used this part beyond testing it out. I've tried googling trouble shooting issues and even had my husband who is "Mr Fix-it" look at it with no results. It isn't spraying solution and the suction is weak. I can look into the warranty but it's frustrating because I haven't even finished paying off the installments on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kae

customer_reviews.title: Big and Expensive but Cleans Great
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the Hoover Dual-V that it replaced: Pros: * Cleans significantly better * A little easier to fill and drain * Much more rugged Cons: * More Expensive * Much Bigger and Heavier * Does not have separate soap tank - you have to pre-mix which makes it a hassle to switch from cleaning to rinsing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a new house with brand new carpet throughout the entire upstairs and I hate carpet because it holds so much dirt and it's gross. I invested in this one in hopes it would help keep the carpets clean. So far in the month I have had it I have cleaned 4 different rooms and our cloth kitchen chairs with it and it works amazing. I've even used it to get paint out of the carpet and it worked like magic.
customer_reviews.author: Aleshia Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: So this is a little bulky but it is a must have for any home. We have 4 dogs and one is very elderly and incontinent. This really made the floors unsafe and very smelly. This machine has really saved the health of my family. Using it is a workout but really cleans the carpets in minimal pass through. The dirtiest rooms in the house can be completely cleaned in 10-15 min with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for over 18 months now, and I am completely satisfied with this purchase. I have used it dozens of times (military- we move a lot and rent wherever we go), from general cleaning to battling rooms that were clearly the favorite potty-site of previous renter's pets. I am picky about germs and very sensitive to odors, and I have four young kids and a dog...so I use this at least a few times every month, plus whole house deep cleaning when we move in/out of homes. It makes the carpets soft and clean-smelling and I would recommend this a hundred times over. Totally worth the price, it is a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: MellowYellow

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine to clean up after my dog. I had the carpets cleaned professionally and they did a fantastic job. The first time I used this machine it was about a month later and just to clean the soiled areas from the dog, to my surprise, the next day I noticed the areas I cleaned were cleaner than the surrounding areas that had just been professionally done. Very nice machine.
customer_reviews.author: RICK’s wife Ann

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This is gives a very good deep clean. I have less than 2 year old carpeting and I couldn’t believe how dirty the water was when I emptied the dirty water reservoir. Pleasant scent. Very pleased with my purchase. I don’t have carpeted stairs so I didn’t review how it worked on stairs. Can’t wait to use the upholstery attachment!
customer_reviews.author: Enid Ann

customer_reviews.title: Did test drive renting same machine from Lowe’s.
customer_reviews.text: Rented one from Lowe’s to clean carpets in our rental property. Works better than rug doctor machines I’ve rented in the past. Carpets dry relatively quickly. Being a short term rental, carpets needs a cleaning every couple of seasons. Do the math. Will pay for itself in a couple of years. Tried with different detergents and got similar results.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ho

customer_reviews.title: This really is a great machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be too big and clunky but I took a leap of faith based on the reviews. I can not believe all the disgusting filth this machine pulled out of my carpet AND my recently cleaned rug. I probably could have kept cleaning as the water was definitely not clear when I stopped. This machine also made the fibers really soft. There's really no reason not to get this machine, I'm in love (and it fits in my closet, so its not too big).
customer_reviews.author: Danette Nelson

customer_reviews.title: UPS hire people who read.and follow direction.
customer_reviews.text: Never took it out the box. Picked up the handle, the switch was broken. They should have put it in a second box for protection. Amozon was great in returning it. But UPS isn't so smart. It was right there on my Porch, a big letter pointing to item. I opened the door to see UPS pulling away. I had to holler Its right here. I guess UPS cant read.
customer_reviews.author: Peter DeCicco

customer_reviews.title: Not dispensing water after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: Used product one time and it worked fine. Took all removable parts off, cleaned thoroughly, boxed it up and stored it. Took it out a year later to use again, and it won’t dispense the water. The wand and vacuum portion work, but the actual machine doesn’t dispense water at all. Ran troubleshooting steps per Bissells website, no such luck. Called Bissell and I have to take it to an authorized service center. Depending on the issue it should be warrantied, so that’s good. Just a huge hassle to have this thing break after 1 use. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time and already am glad I made this purchase. It did a fantastic job cleaning my carpets, which take a beating with 2 dogs and with living on a lake. Super easy to use and my carpets looked better than when I pay hundreds to have them professionally done. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Miller-Mission

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, even for berber
customer_reviews.text: We have some very thick berber carpets, and we have a dog that plays on a dark-sand beach every day. Professional Oxi-cleaning has looked good at first, but the spots just came back. I was afraid of deep, steam cleaning because I worried that the thickest carpet would not dry, and that mildew would result. This machine got the dirt out, and the spots didn't come back. The suction is strong, and the machine pulled out the water it sprayed. I can clean my carpet more frequently now. The machine's profile is tidy for storage. I highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: It is no rug doctor!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 2 rug doctors in the last 10 years and have always been satisfied with their performance. When I went to look at reviews, there were a lot for this Bissell. It had a long hose and removable tank to fill the water (I thought they were pluses so I bought it. The suction was just ok. The tank to empty the dirty waer leaked all the way to the bathroom to dump it. Anyone who is reading this review and they are trying to decide, the rug doctor is better hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B Salazar

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MACHINE!
customer_reviews.text: l rent out several apartments/houses. I thought the Rug Doctor was good until Lowes started renting this machine. The Dr. leaves the carpets too wet and the deep down dirt wicks to the surface as part of the drying process. All of a sudden, my Lowes had switched to the Rug Doctor. l bought my own Big Green. Lowes then switched back; l guess l wasn't the only one to whine! My only advice, other than "buy one" is "don't loan it to your friends"...Bissel's great warranty doesn't cover stupid stuff like stepping on a tank or the upholstery tool.
customer_reviews.author: Tim from Tuckerton

customer_reviews.title: I thought I had a clean house....
customer_reviews.text: Our home was what I considered pretty clean. Our carpet had no sign of really being dirty but we had just purchased our new home 6 months ago and the carpet stayed from the previous owner. We didnt have carpet in our previous home because I think its gross and accumulates dust, dirt, allergens, and germs...and boy was I right! What came out of our "clean" carpet almost made me lose my cookies!! I had to dump it outside it was so vile! This carpet cleaner definitely works! I would buy it again a million times over!
customer_reviews.author: Rosidro

customer_reviews.title: Loving the results
customer_reviews.text: I have another Bessel carpet cleaner but it is a smaller version and I have the spotbot. This did a great job. New puppy still being house broken and needed it desperately. Gets the smell and stains out. When I compared the cost to hiring someone it just made sense. This does just a good a job. I had a rug doctor in the past and this is better so far.
customer_reviews.author: lyn91

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased a handful of run-of-the-mill carpet cleaners and have never been very satisfied with their performance. I decided to spend a little bit more money and get a heavier duty machine and I am glad that I did. It uses more water than a standard unit, is better built and has much more suction power. Unlike the other machines this machine leaves my carpets dry in about an hour at 68*F room temp.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Use the Spray Trigger on Forward Pass Only
customer_reviews.text: Due to the location of the Spray Nozzle the Spray Trigger should only be used in the forward direction...The User Directions are vague on that, but spraying the carpet on a reverse pass will only wet it a bit more and the brush will never touch it...The Vacuum Nozzle will immediately pass over it and suck it up...You will be using 50% more solution and wasting that 50%...At what the cost is for that stuff I thought anyone who reads the user manual should be informed... However, it is probably the best carpet cleaner you will ever use...Just don't squirt your money away....
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: I have also used Chemical Guys Fabric Clean with excellent results but it does need defoamer in this machine
customer_reviews.text: This thing does a fair job and it pays for itself in just a couple uses over renting from the store. Comes with enough sample cleaner for about 12 gal of mix. Bissell cleaner works well and does not foam but it is overpriced. I have also used Chemical Guys Fabric Clean with excellent results but it does need defoamer in this machine. Heat your water to near boiling and mix your solution in the tank and this extracts well enough that standard pile carpet dries in a couple hours. Nothing is going to replace a hand wand, high heat and high pressure but this little guy might be the next best thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast
customer_reviews.text: Amazing suction power. I tried it out on a high-traffic area. Pre-treated a couple of stains. Vacuumed thoroughly first. The rinse water was black when I finished, with quite a bit of dirt that my Shark HEPA vacuum apparently didn’t pick up. I can’t wait to do all the carpets in the house, and then go back and clean them again until the rinse water is cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: C. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Best carpet cleaner I have used
customer_reviews.text: We used this machine on a rental with super dirty carpet that had a smell. We live in a cold environment so were worried about carpets drying. This machine not only cleaned well but removed the majority of the water used for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Made in China - Junk
customer_reviews.text: Defective and returned. Leaks water all over the place. Creates a mess with carpet fluff debris which indicates its vacuum power is minimal and it doesn't really clean that well. This thing is so heavy its like driving your grandfather's Buick. Quality stinks. Horrid product.
customer_reviews.author: Wang Chung

customer_reviews.title: Pray for us.
customer_reviews.text: First off: we have 3 children, 4 dogs, 6 cats. I can probably stop the review there, and if I give this 5 stars, it should serve a normal family's needs. However, we bought nearly-white carpets for three bedrooms because, well, we obviously like doing things the hard way. We have rented, borrowed, bought, broken more shampooers than we would like to think about. All have failed except this green machine. It is worth the money. We use it every day. Isn't that horrible? Every.day.
customer_reviews.author: PeteMcRepeat

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent on a machine that works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Was going to rent a carpet cleaner from Home Depot but I didn't want to spend all day cleaning the whole house. This gives me the flexibility to do sections at a time and not be overwhelmed. Fantastic suction and cleaning from the dirty water reservoir. Set in stains all came out. Wish the attachment hose was longer for the stairs but that'll probably decrease the suction capability. My only gripe is during water change out, the dirty water drips on to the machine a little where the connection to the machine attachment is. Keep a rag handy to wipe it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this years ago
customer_reviews.text: But better late than never. I have rented Rug Doctors' from Home Depot for years, so I am very familiar with how a "commercial" machine should perform. So I was hoping that this Bissell would do at least as well. My hopes were exceeded many times over. This is an awesome machine. It makes even the filthiest, most stubborn spots look like new again. The 86T3 includes the upholstery attachment. This is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Works well, saves money
customer_reviews.text: I have used the truck mounted services forever and I am never satisfied. I point out areas of dirt and stain and 90% of the time it is still there when the carpet dries. My dog was very sick and throwing up every 20 minutes. I took her to the dog hospital in the middle of the night. This cleaner removed it all. You may have to go over it a couple times but it will get the job done. It takes longer than I thought it would bc you have to go slow to get all the water up but it is still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: matt smith

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great and extracts nearly all of the water and solution.
customer_reviews.text: This machine does an amazing job! It has a large water capacity—for both the clean and the dirty water tanks. It has strong suction, so it cleans well and leaves the carpet barely damp, allowing for quick drying. We used the pet formula; it smells WONDERFUL and removed some really bad stains. It has a long cord and the upholstery hose is long and does a great job, as well. It works better than any of the other Bissell carpet cleaners that I’ve owned, because it extracts almost all of the water. Now, I no longer have to rent a filthy cleaner—that might not work. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L.

customer_reviews.title: WOW just WOW
customer_reviews.text: Came today and I started cleaning the living room carpet. I really thought it would take forever and I would have to go over it several times to get the carpet clean. WOW was I wrong. Couple of hours and the carpet is as clean or cleaner than it has ever been. This is my second dog since the carpet was last cleaned, and I can't wait to do the bedrooms and living room chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSED!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best $299 spent in a long time!~ we got when they had the 100 off sale about a month ago. since we have cleaned the entire house, and spot cleaned after pets several times for muddy paws. This will be heavily used in our house! Works very very well, our carpets looked better than when we paid $350 to have them done about a year ago. great investment. easy to use and light, I am 105lbs and have no difficulties at all. also the carpet dried so much quicker than any service we have had in past! win-win!
customer_reviews.author: mrsbeasley

customer_reviews.title: It’s a beast
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a beast. It’s the best built vacuum we’ve ever bought. The dirty water reservoir is a testament to its ability to clean the carpet and it gets nasty. It is pretty heavy though, so keep that in mind with stairs. This machine is superior to the RugDoc as it extracts forward and backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Nate S.

customer_reviews.title: that it is way better. i rented it and was convinced int he ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to get one of these for several years. After using "the red ones" from that big box store rental stand,me wife told me to try this one, that it is way better. i rented it and was convinced int he first 20 seconds. The power difference is outstanding and undeniable by everyone. I rented the green one a few more times, as we have three full sized dogs and they do a number on our carpets over the course of a year. Now, we can keep it up on a monthly basis, and everyone is happy...except the box store that no longer gets my rental money!
customer_reviews.author: The MC's

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time with anything else. Seriously.
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs, both of which are getting older. With that comes accidents. We've been using a different Bissell product weekly for years and had gotten to the point where we were going to replace the carpets. This thing is unbelievable. Definitely go over it multiple times, but you will not be disappointed with this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Just managed to remove a filthy renter from one of my homes. The Berber carpets looked as if she had run around barefoot in the mud every day for an hour, and then entered the house and scuffed her dirty feet around in every room. This carpet cleaner was a godsend. Although it took me a few days to accomplish it, this machine and some serious elbow-grease enabled me to get the carpets looking almost new! I can't tell you how thrilled I was to not have to replace the carpet. I recommend this to anybody with seriously soiled carpeting of any kind. Truly impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Genoa

customer_reviews.title: OMG! Amazing!!! Hose is great too!!!
customer_reviews.text: ***** Update ***** We used the hose attachment today! Works wonderfully!!! The hose attachment DOES suck up the water and does a great job of it too. We are quite surprised and pleased 😃 ****end of update**** Easy to assemble and use! Works as advertised. We have white berber carpet that is 18 years old and has been through 5 dogs. Currently we have 2 boys who have a tendency to mark😡. Hence needing the steam cleaner. We use the big green with the pet pre-treatment and the pet cleaner formula. Just WOW! You can see where we stopped for the night. The carpet is nearly dry right after cleaning. AND it looks nearly new!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Long

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Know the commercials for steam cleaning that show the difference in the one pass & it's a clean stripe surrounded by a dirty surface? That's this machine. The only downside is if you only wanted to spot clean, you'll end up with a too clean spot & need to finish the rest of the carpet or furniture piece. This is even powerful enough to finish pulling hair out of carpet that a DC65 misses, let alone all the water put down. Go slow, don't be in a rush, go over the surface until you no longer see water coming up, & you'll have clean & dry carpet/upholstery in a very short time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a variety of carpet cleaners over the past couple of years but this one is hands down the one i would recommend. I own a couple of rental properties so paying someone to steam clean the carpet or having to rent a carpet cleaner adds up quick. This was a one time investment that has already saved me thousands of dollars on carpet cleaning services. This cleans the carpet very well giving you great looking results every time. It is easy to assemble and compact enough to take around in the truck off your car. The carpet rarely feels wet after washing it due to the great suction power of the cleaner. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Simranjit S.

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: I got it for a much lower price because they were running a deal and I had my eye on this. I like it but it doesn't remove everything off the floor. It throws clumps of hair around, which I'm not sure if that's normal since I've never used a machine like this before. It is alot better than smaller versions and the carpet dries in an hour. Extremely easy to use but I took one star off because it didn't clean up as good as I thought it would and my carpet wasn't that bad to begin with. But I don't regret my purchase at all, I'm sure it will do a great job cleaning cars carpet as well
customer_reviews.author: pokedbz1691

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and still working like new
customer_reviews.text: I bought it 3 years ago, and I have never had to replace anything on it, just new carpet cleaner and it is good to go, it works quite well and it is not hard to use, it is a little on the heavy side, but that is to be expected. So far very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great machine.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this to clean upholstery, couch, recliners, and auto upholstery several times. We have grand children who are constantly spilling food and drinks (that is what grand kids are for, right?) Went through multiple cleaners over the years. Cleaned them per directions after each use and every one failed within 6 mos to a year. This cleaner seems sturdy and well built. Have used it for about a year now with no problems. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is insanely better than others I've used
customer_reviews.text: I can't rave about this thing to anyone I know in fear they will ask to borrow it. Got it about 4 or 5 months ago and it blows all my past cleaners right out of the water. I contemplated between this one and the rug doctor which I'd used before and seemed decent enough. After hours of research and YouTube videos I went with the bissel. Such a great machine. Ooh, the satisfaction of clean carpets. Well done Bissel. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: The Big Green is the real stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is awesome. We bought a house with existing carpet in the bedrooms and it did an amazing job of refreshing the carpet. There are many solutions to choose from but all do a great job. We plan on deep cleaning 1-2 times a year. Very easy to use. Has a long cable and a wonderful attachment for edges and upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Paul

customer_reviews.title: Top tool
customer_reviews.text: I am retired. I have a truck mount carpet cleaning equipment. My son who also is in janitorial work bought one these. I was impressed with it's preformane. I bought one for home and occasionally helping my son. It is easier to use this than get all that truck mount equipment out. I highly recommend this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Kick

customer_reviews.title: I have owed many carpet cleaning machines but this one is hands down the best. I removed dirt and dont even know where ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow I am right there with all the 5 star reviewers. I have owed many carpet cleaning machines but this one is hands down the best. I removed dirt and dont even know where it came from. I vacuum weekly, cleaned my carpets regularly, no shoes in house no eating outside the kitchen and still the dirt that came out was remarkable. Areas that I scrubbed by hand then went over with my old cleaner never would come clean. One swipe with my big green machine and it was proven fact at that point this machine is a keeper, I knew going in if this took out that stain there was no looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tried and True

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works wonders. What a great value!
customer_reviews.text: Our steam cleaner was just not getting our light carpets clean enough so I bought this bad boy. The carpets now look and feel like they’re brand new! I had visitors and they were blown away on how I can have kids and pets and light carpets so clean.
customer_reviews.author: CAFEINITA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had purchased this sooner. This machine has my carpets looking like new. If you're going to have carpet this light, you definitely need this amazing machine. Any other machine will only do a minimal job. I'm very happy 😊
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: A similar machine rented from home depot costs nearly $60/day. I decided to buy this as I have 3 rental properties and also need to clean my home every now and then. Works as described, pretty sturdy machine. I was surprised at how much dirt it actually pull out of the carpets, which at the first glance seem clean. I am pretty happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Raj Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased the Bissell Big Green. I have a multi-pet household and steam clean my carpets every 1 to 3 months. I wear out regular grade steam cleaners pretty quickly. I thought my prior steam cleaners(non-commercial) did a good job but this one put them to shame. The only downside is that its a lot heavier but I will sacrifice my back to have such clean carpets. It holds more water so I don't have to dump the dirty water and fill up the clean water/cleaning solution as often. It was also easier to clean and with the fold down handle takes up less space.
customer_reviews.author: L.B.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the cheap ones.
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but does a great job on carpets. The hose is long enough to set the unit at the top of the stairs and do the upper half, then move the unit to the bottom of the stairs and do the lower half. Solution tank is 2 gallons and the dirty tank will hold all of that. It hasn't happened to me, but apparently a weak link is the flow indicator. For 9 bucks I bought a spare to have on hand if it starts leaking. There is a way to bypass the indicator in a pinch that I saw on youtube.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: This carpet cleaning machine is FANTASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this carpet cleaner after my third (in 30 years) box store cleaner died. This is more expensive but works GREAT. I have been saying for years "it would be nice to get what I paid for at lease once" well this is it, It really gets carpet clean and with little work. It extracts more dirt / water from the carpet than any other I have used. The accessory hose and brush work well on furniture and stairs. Overall this is a great tool and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Carl J. Schnooberger

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaning of all I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several carpet shampooers since the '70's - 2 Bissell, at least 3 Hoover, and this one by far out cleans them all! Best at extracting water, carpet is dry in a couple hours - my biggest complaint with others. The only negatives with this cleaner are the price, it is bulky, heavy to move around ( I wouldn't want to carry it up a flight of stairs), and can't get into tight spaces easily. If you want REALLY clean carpet, and quick drying time, bite the bullet and buy this shampooer!
customer_reviews.author: Wenger6

customer_reviews.title: A Necessity with Pets
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We had an old Bissell product for 10 years. It was a pain to put together and take apart and hit and miss to get the suction out of it. This is a huge improvement and easy to get ready, easy to clean and easy to use. Good job, Bissell! It was a good investment. It has already saved me with that occasional dog vomit on the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Balls of carpet Lint are all over the place
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning power is really good but I have a couple of issues with this. Every few minutes or so, I have to pick up those balls of carpet lint. It's very annoying. The liquid containers are not so tight. If you leave it sitting there for a few seconds of so, it would start leaking and leave some wet area. Be careful for your carpet, if you put strong mixture, it can stain your carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Nell Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Ivy League grad redeemed by simple industrial strength appliance.  Anne Sexton would be so proud.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. My husband installed off-white carpets when I wasn't paying attention to his house purchase decisions and yes, folks, that's my life. White Berber carpets that are a pain to vacuum because so much dirt can hide down in the weave. So to say this appliance makes me feel like a good person, a person worthy of love and respect, is an understatement. All that dirt that pours out is just pure redemption to me. I just wish I could strap it on my back and carry it down the carpeted stairs. Yup, that's my husband. WHITE CARPETED STAIRS....
customer_reviews.author: Alison Ruge

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST carpet cleaner I have ever owned. It's AMAZING. My year-round allergies have actually been halved in severity because this thing was able to pull most of the imbedded pollen out of my carpet. Mostly I use this for pet accidents. It works really well, and as long as you go over the cleaned area with the carpet cleaner to suction up all the excess water, your carpets will be dry in a matter of hours. My only complaint is that there is literally no where on this machine to store the hose attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Annon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to call the pros to do our carpeting again but decided to buy a shampooer. The last time we had our house done was 3 years ago so it was due. I looked at many reviews on Amazon for different shampooers and decided to go with this one, thank goodness. The results were excellent! It made the carpeting look like brand new. So far I've done only the main floor and the shampooer worked excellent. I highly recommend the shampooer over the others. I've rented shampooers in the past and have dealt with grime and hair in and around the brush and it's just gross so getting a new one was the avenue I wanted to go.
customer_reviews.author: Droidrev71

customer_reviews.title: Very well made machine
customer_reviews.text: Did I mention that the machine is VERY WELL MADE? Very effective deep cleaning. Suctions a great deal of the water, leaving the carpet damp but not wet. Easy to use. Tanks are large enough for longer usage. Design of the machine uses the weight of the tanks to keep the machine "planted" on the carpet. The only minus is that the soiled water tank drips a little bit after it is removed to be emptied. I place a shallow plastic pan under the soiled water tank while I carry it, to prevent it from dripping onto my CLEAN carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best Consumer Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I held out and snagged this on prime days for $299. I received it and put it to work right away and all I can say is WOW! This thing is heavy and a little cumbersome to move around but it gets the job done quickly and efficiently. Refilling, dumping and cleaning is extremely easy and the suction power is great. The key is to properly clean it after every use and I feel confident this cleaner will last me for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: DWCali

customer_reviews.title: Buy it !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally worth every single penny. It has a powerful suction unlike no other. The tank capacity is so big. You only have to fill it once. I did the entire house off of one tank. Dries quickly. Super easy to clean the parts and inside of it. I had the pet pro prior to this and it out does that one tremendously. You will not regret buying this. The only con is it's heavy but that's not a big deal. Also it's not the easiest to turn but that's not a game changer. I completely love it
customer_reviews.author: mkoana

product_meta.title: Bissell Big Green Professional Carpet Cleaner Machine, 86T3
product_meta.description: Style Name:Big Green OnlyThe Bissell big green deep cleaning machine professional grade carpet cleaner achieves a whole new level of clean with its powerful motors and extra large brush roll to pull out deep down dirt. It's made of super durable, high quality materials for sturdy, Anti-Tip design, and features robust workmanship from top to bottom. The big green deep cleaning machine outcleans the leading rental carpet cleaner. Cleaning Path Width: 10. 5" . Buying this product saves pets. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.
feature_bullets: Machine dimensions: 20.5 x 11 x 42.25. Weight: 53 lbs. Cleaning path width: 10.5”. Power rating: 12 amps. Power cord length: 25 feet. Tank size: 1.75 gallons
This cleaner uses hot water extraction to clean; it does not produce steam and is design for carpet cleaning only
Heavy-duty suction power aids in fast drying time. Cleans on the forward and backward pass for reduced cleaning time and dries faster than the leading competitive rental carpet cleaners

Your purchase includes One Bissell 86T3 Big Green Professional Carpet Cleaner Machine, One 9 foot hose, One poly bag to hold the hose and attachments. , One 6" stair tool, Three Trial-Size BISSELL Formulas

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars6,451 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
